actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 49 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit union organization and membership in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any individual or entity to solicit to enrolled or enroll any member of the armed forces in any labor organization or for any member to encourage others to join or the actively support any military labor organization. Sets forth penalties for violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 49 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit union organization and membership in the Armed Forces.
